org.wattdepot.simpleapp
Class SimpleApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.wattdepot.simpleapp.SimpleApplication

public class SimpleApplication
extends java.lang.Object

A simple application that shows basic interaction with a running WattDepot server.

Author:
Philip Johnson

Constructor Summary
SimpleApplication(java.lang.String url)
          Instantiates this class and ensures that the passed URL identifies a running client.

Constructor Detail

SimpleApplication

public SimpleApplication(java.lang.String url)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Instantiates this class and ensures that the passed URL identifies a running client.

Parameters:
url - A URL that should point to a running WattDepot server.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If the URL does not appear to point to a running WattDepot server.
Method Detail

getCurrentPower

public double getCurrentPower(java.lang.String source)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Get the latest recorded power for a source. Throws an exception if this data is more than one minute old.

Parameters:
source - The source of interest.
Returns:
The latest recorded power.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If latency of latest power exceeds 60 seconds.

getDailyEnergy

public double getDailyEnergy(java.lang.String source,
                             java.lang.String dayString)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the daily energy associated with the given source on the given day.

Parameters:
source - The source.
dayString - The day of interest in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Returns:
The amount of energy consumed by that source on that day.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If problems occur obtaining that data from WattDepot.

getEnergySince

public double getEnergySince(java.lang.String source,
                             java.lang.String dayString)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the energy consumed for the given source since the start of the given day.

Parameters:
source - The source of interest.
dayString - The start day.
Returns:
The total energy consumed in watts since the start day to the latest sensor data.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If problems occur with WattDepot, or the start day is after the latest sensor data.

getClient

public org.wattdepot.client.WattDepotClient getClient()
Returns the WattDepotClient associated with this instance.

Returns:
The WattDepotClient.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Illustrate simple interaction with WattDepot.

Parameters:
args - The first arg should be the URL to a running WattDepot server.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If problems occur communicating with the server.
